mapper.insert: INSERT INTO plan_master SET plan_party_seq = #{planPartySeq}, plan_start_dt = #{planStartDt}, plan_start_time = #{planStartTime}, plan_title = #{planTitle}, plan_contents = #{planContents}
mapper.update: UPDATE plan_master SET plan_completed = 2 WHERE plan_seq = #{planSeq} AND plan_completed = 1
mapper.select: SELECT plan_seq AS planSeq, plan_party_seq AS planPartySeq, plan_start_dt AS planStartDt, plan_start_time AS planStartTime, plan_completed AS planCompleted, plan_title AS planTitle, plan_contents AS planContents FROM plan_master WHERE plan_party_seq = #{planPartySeq}

SELECT plan_seq AS planSeq, plan_party_seq AS planPartySeq, plan_start_dt AS planStartDt, plan_start_time AS planStartTime, plan_title AS planTitle, plan_contents AS planContents FROM plan_master WHERE plan_seq = #{planSeq}
